text: Immediately configure your settings under the Config menu:
CURSOR > MEMORY
ATB > WAIT
MOVEMENT > RUN
BATTLE SPEED > MAX
FIELD MESSAGE > MAX
TARGET WINDOW > ALWAYS
CAMERA > FIXED
Pick up the 2 treasures in the back of the room, then light the candle.
Masked man: Have everyone Steal once; reset if you don't get the Mage Masher. Once you get the Mage Masher, simply have everyone attack themselves to end the battle; you won't get a Game Over.
Reply that you are kidnapping Princess Garnet; it takes 3 extra minutes to trigger the secret scene with Ruby and it's just regular dialogue.
As Vivi, search the house to the right, then head up the street.
Search the item shop, but skip the pub; you'll search it on Disc 3.
When you arrive at the square, head right and search the shops; do not approach the ticket booth just yet. Also, don't forget the Phoenix Pinion to the left of the main gate.

Leave the square by way of the bottom left exit and head toward the docks;enter the house ONLY if you see a girl run OUT of it, otherwise keep going. There are 2 treasures in this house, but you can pick them up on Disc 3.
Speak with the boy behind the steeple, reply "Yes" and head all the way back to where you first gained control of Vivi.
Head down, search the square and speak to the cat near the bottom of the screen. Now go to the ticket booth and show the ticket master your ticket.
Then, enter the alley once again and choose the first answer to every question asked.
Speak to Tom behind the steeple to claim your reward for finding the cat, a Bomb Card.
Follow the Rat Boy into the steeple, search it and then attempt to climb the ladder.
Pick up Kupo's letter for delivery and save your game.
You can do some jump rope now but you can wait until after Excalibur II with little impact - see guide for details.
Target time: 00:08:25
Climb the ladder and follow Rat Boy over the rooftops; don't forget tosearch all the bird nests for Gil.
You don't need to press any buttons during the play - the dialogue advances automatically.
BATTLE: KING LEO, BENERO, ZENERO
• Attack Benero and Zenero once each with anyone except Cinna in order to minimize the amount of fake magic animations you have to watch.
• If they attack with magic before your ATB is full, then don't bother with them and begin attacking King Leo, since they will most likely switch to quick physical attacks for the next round anyway.
• Attack King Leo 5 to 6 times to end the battle.
IMPRESSING ALL 100 NOBLES - You need to do this for the missable and unique Moonstone which you are later given as a reward. The 10,000 Gil also comes in VERY handy.
When you encounter Garnet on the stairs, choose whatever option you want.
As Steiner, run up the stairs, through the lower exit and speak to Queen Brahne to claim your well-deserved Moonstone.
Run down the stairs, to the right and save your game with Mosh the moogle.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Enter the door under the walkway and catch the Pluto Knight running on the balcony.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Enter the right chamber on the second floor and speak to the Pluto Knight.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Go back and down the stairs to the first floor, and then enter the left room to find yet another Pluto Knight.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Exit the library and leave the castle.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Talk to the Pluto Knight by the water, then head left and talk to the Pluto Knight by the tower entrance.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Optional: Head right and talk to the disguised Marcus. He doesn't count towards the total, but Steiner will make a comment about there having been an extra knight in his count when getting the Elixir.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Enter and climb the tower.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Speak with the final Pluto Knight on the stairway to receive an Elixir, then continue to the top of the tower.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Optimize Zidane and follow the princess.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: Once in the boiler room, turn the lever both ways to make 2 treasure chests fall from the ceiling; open them and go through the door.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: BATTLE: STEINER

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: • 1st fight: Have Zidane attack and Blank and Cinna Steal a Leather Hat (and a Silk Shirt if you like).

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: • 2nd fight: Knock out everyone except Garnet.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: • 3rd fight: Knock out everyone except Garnet.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE
text: At the crash site, watch the ATE and save your game.

area: ALEXANDRIA CASTLE GUARDHOUSE - PRIMA VISTA CRASH SITE

text: Head deeper into the forest to find Garnet.
BATTLE: PLANT BRAIN
• Have Zidane knock himself out to make Blank appear and push the fight into the second and final phase.
• Vivi and Steiner should have full or nearly full ATB gauges by the time Blank shows up, so use Fire, Fire Sword and Blank's physical attack all at once to finish the battle in a single round.
• If you're very lucky, Plant Brain may not even get a single turn.
• Don't waste your time stealing anything; it's not worth it.
Unequip Blank and replace his Iron Sword with a Broadsword, then continue onward.
BATTLE: PLANT SPIDER x 2
• If there are more than 2 Plant Spiders, RESET THE GAME and try again.
• Use a spreaded Fire spell or two physical attacks to win the battle; make sure everyone survives to keep your party at Lv 1.
• Do NOT have Blank absorb all the EXP, as that will make Amarant join the party at Lv 3. You have been warned.
BASE STATS: You can let Steiner absorb all of the forced EXP here, regardless of how many Plant Spiders appear.
Skip the tutorial by choosing "Nothing".
On the World Map, head south while the nameplate is displayed to avoid random battles and enter Ice Cavern.
Exit immediately after the scenes and save your game.
TARGET TIME : 00:50:33 (+ 7:50) | TARGET GIL : 12,013 | ENCOUNTERS : 0 |
This is a pretty straightforward area, just search every screen.
Never make contact with the white wind as touching it instantly throws you into a random battle. Wait for it to die down or turn dark; that's when it's safe to pass through.

Although it's still not exactly easy, you can make it through the entire area without any encounters by changing screens a bit more often than otherwise necessary - changing screens resets the encounter check.

On the screen with the Potion and the Ether, pick up only one per trip, backtracking to the previous screen after getting each, and then getting past the screen on a third entry. You may want to start with the Potion since it's the harder to grab without a battle.
On the screen after that, get both of the chests on the right, then move on to the next area and immediately backtrack to defrost the wall and loot the third chest.
In the final area, grab the Phoenix Down and continue onward.
Head left at the fork, defrost Mois the moogle, skip the tutorial, accept the letter for Gumo, and finally save.
Now backtrack to the previous area, defrost the wall, and pick up the Leather Wrist in the chest at the end of the tunnel.
Make sure Zidane is equipped with the Mage Masher, Leather Hat, Leather Wrist, Leather Shirt, and Moonstone.
Optimize everyone else and activate Steiner's Bird Killer ability.
Return to the fork and save again with Mois.
[TARGET TIME: 00:54:48]
Move onward to confront...
BATTLE: BLACK WALTZ #1 & SEALION
• Alternate between attacking Black Waltz #1 and using a Potion.
• Once Black Waltz #1 is defeated, begin Stealing from Sealion.
• Use a Potion when needed and wait for the Trance gauge to fill.
• Reset if you don't steal the Mythril Dagger; if you steal it and have extra turns left, make sure you get his Ether as well.
• Once Zidane reaches Trance, use a physical attack followed by Tidal Flame to end the battle. |
Z | Protect Girls 8/35
Go chill with Mois again after the battle :P (yes, pun intended)
TARGET TIME : 01:02:14 (+11:41) | TARGET GIL : 12,352 | ENCOUNTERS : 0

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: Say goodbye to Ice Cavern and run across Nolrich Heights to enter Dali.

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: Leave the inn, head upwards and right to enter a farm plot, then go back to enter and exit the pub, and then enter and exit the windmill.

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: Speak with Vivi, then go to the shop across from the inn; Garnet should be there now.

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: After the conversation, sell all your Phoenix Pinion and buy the following:

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: :  5 Feather Hat       1,000

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: :  3 Leather Shirt       810

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: Now return to the inn and deliver Mois's letter to Gumo, then go to your room and talk to Garnet.

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: After the scenes, head back to where you spoke with Vivi earlier, and then enter the windmill and go down the hatch.

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: Make your way through the screens until you reunite with Vivi, picking up all the items except the Iron Helm, which you should grab on the way back to the barrel with Kumop.

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: Find Kumop in the barrel, take his letter to Mogki and save your game.

area: ICE CAVERN CAVE - DALI STORAGE AREA
text: TARGET TIME : 01:14:22 (+12:08) | TARGET GIL :  1,108  | ENCOUNTERS : 0 |

Proceed onward, then examine and choose to open the large door; run from the resulting battle with Flee or, if you're lucky, L1+R1 escape. Since the save point is so close, I would reset if you get stuck watching too many spell animations before running away.
Open all 3 chests in the Mist room, then continue to the end of the area.
Optimize Zidane and Vivi and activate Zidane's Bandit ability.
Don't bother healing or reviving anyone as you will be fully healed prior to the upcoming boss fight.
Steiner should be equipped with the Iron Sword, Bronze Helm, Bronze Gloves and Bronze Armor, with the Bird Killer ability activated; if not, make the necessary adjustments now.
Head down the mountain, pick up both treasures at the base, enter Morrid's house and stand still; this often makes him come inside immediately.
Talk to Morrid, then leave Observatory Mountain.
Choose the second option when examining the barrel.
BATTLE: BLACK WALTZ #2
• Don't enter any commands until Black Waltz #2 makes his first move.
• Make both Steiner and Zidane attack (Fire Sword if Vivi survives the boss's first attack), and keep Vivi and Garnet on stand-by. Don't heal any damage yet.
• Wait for Black Waltz #2's second attack to connect, then have Vivi attack whoever was targeted by this move. If it was him and he was knocked out then the boss did this step for you.
• Next, make Steiner and Zidane attack again.
• Finally, have Garnet throw a Potion on Steiner or Zidane if they're no longer at full HP.
• Black Waltz #2's Fira counter should be neutralized and so his third attack will now be another single-target one.
• Have Steiner and Zidane attack to win the battle; you can use Fire Sword if Vivi hasn't been knocked out.
• If you didn't Steal an Ether from Sealion, then make sure Black Waltz #2 drops 2 of them.
Choose to depart immediately after Garnet corrects her speech.
On the airship, climb the ladder in the back of the engine room and head into the cockpit.
BATTLE: BLACK WALTZ #3
• This battle is very easy because it always follows the same pattern.
• For the first round, have Zidane attack, Steiner use Fire Sword and Vivi cast Fire x 2.
• For the second round, let Zidane Steal once, then use Fire Sword and Dbl Fire again to win the battle.
In Lindblum, remove everyone's equipment before boarding the lift with Minister Artania.
Once you regain control of Zidane at the inn, skip the last tutorial, enter the neighboring room and read the letter from Ruby; save your game.
TARGET TIME : 01:35:48 (+21:26) | TARGET GIL : 1,779 | ENCOUNTERS : 0

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Head downstairs, pick up the Gil near the entrance and exit the building.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Go upwards to the market square, search the left street area and the house between the two streets.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Head down the right alley and enter Dragoos' Weapon Shop. Auto-arrange your inventory if you like.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: You will need a minimum of 15,120 Gil to make the following purchases. You should be able to make at least the following transactions:

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: SELL

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 5 Hi-Potion 500

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 3 Remedy 450

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 2 Eye Drops 50

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 1 Echo Screen 25

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 1 Phoenix Pinion 1,000

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 1 Rubber Helm 125

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 2 Silk Shirt 400

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 1 Bronze Armor 325

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 2 Tent 800

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: BUY

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 12 Steepled Hat 3,120

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 12 Cotton Robe 12,000

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: You can basically sell all copies of the above items, except for Tent. If you're planning to have Zidane win the Festival of the Hunt (read the next section for a detailed explanation) then you should leave at least 1 Tent in your inventory, preferably 2. If you plan to have Freya win then you can just sell all your Tent.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Now do business as follows:

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: SELL:

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 12 Cotton Robe 24,000

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: BUY

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 19 Steepled Hat 4,940

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 19 Cotton Robe 19,000

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: SELL

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 19 Cotton Robe

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: BUY

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 30 Steepled Hat 7,800

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 30 Cotton Robe 30,000

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: SELL

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 30 Cotton Robe 60,000

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: BUY

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 1 Dagger 320

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 2 Mage Masher 1,000

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 1 Javelin 880

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 43 Steepled Hat 11,180

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 1 Butterfly Sword 300

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 1 The Ogre 700

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 38 Cotton Robe 38,000

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 4 Desert Boots 1,200

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: : 4 Yellow Scarf 1,600

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Return to the aircab terminal opposite the Lindblum inn and commute to the Industrial District.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Loot the place, then fly to the Theater District and head to the Tantalus hideout.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Pick up all the treasures in the hideout, then head down the stairs outside.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Speak with the crowd, then follow the "moogle" to Artist Michael's studio.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Take the Moogle Suit, the Autograph and the Ore, then take an aircab to Lindblum Castle.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Enter the guest room, speak with Steiner and then attempt to take the lift.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Speak to the sleeping guard outside the guest room, then take the lift and find Garnet at the overlook.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Find all 6 areas with the telescope.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: Back in the guest room, open both chests, deliver Kumop's letter, take the letter for Atla and save your game.

area: LINDBLUM INN - LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM
text: TARGET TIME : 01:51:20 (+15:32) | TARGET GIL : 6,151 | ENCOUNTERS : 0 |

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: Use FAQ to decide who you want to win the festival

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: Head straight for the aircab dock - you'll have plenty of time for all other preparations once the festival timer starts.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: Equip Zidane with The Ogre, Steepled Hat, Leather Wrist, Bronze Vest and Yellow Scarf; activate his Beast Killer ability; put him in the back row.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: If you want Zidane or Vivi to win, then just wait in the Business District shopping area to fight Zaghnol.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: Avoid the Trick Sparrow outside the station by hugging the right side of the screen (the Mu only appears after battling the Trick Sparrow so don't worry about it). Doing this also leaves you with the most possible options for monsters to fight after Zaghnol if you want a specific number of points for Zidane.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: If you want Freya to be the victor, then engage one of the Fangs in the Business District. Either the one standing on the left or the one chasing Vivi will do.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: Simply have Zidane remain idle and get beat up by the Fang to fill up his Trance gauge. Use a Potion whenever needed and knock out the Fang once you're 1 or 2 hits away from reaching Trance.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: Wait until the clock reads 4:30 or less, then go to the square to fight...

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: BATTLE: ZAGHNOL (ZIDANE)

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: • Have Zidane and Freya throw Tent until it connects.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: • Then make Freya Jump each round and Zidane Steal. Use a Potion if Heave connects and have Zidane begin attacking once you've stolen the Needle Fork.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: • Zaghnol has 1,574 HP; keep track of it with a calculator and make sure Zidane deals the finishing blow.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: BATTLE: ZAGHNOL (FREYA)

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: • Make Zidane Steal and keep Freya on stand-by to administer Potion.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: • You will most likely need to get the Needle Fork within 2 attempts.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: • Zidane should enter Trance within 1 or 2 attacks from Zaghnol; once he does and you have the Needle Fork, simply use Shift Break and have Freya Jump to end the battle with her dealing the finishing blow.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: BATTLE: ZAGHNOL (VIVI)

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: • Have Zidane Steal until he grabs the Needle Fork and keep Freya on stand-by to administer Potion or Phoenix Down if needed.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: • Knock out both of them once you have the Needle Fork.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: If you want Zidane to win then after the battle you will still have the time left on the clock to seek out the necessary monster(s) for any remaining points. If you want to get 100 then it should be possible for almost all values awarded for Zaghnol; check the tables.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: Don't forget to heal Zidane and equip The Ogre.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: Some luck is involved as you never have more than a 1 out of 3 chance of getting the desired value, but these are rather good odds compared to some other things in this challenge.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: After the scenes, take the lift to the base level station, ride to and open the chest at the Serpent's Gate and then ride straight to the Dragon's Gate.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: Read the letter Moodon received from Stiltzkin, then save your game.

area: LINDBLUM CASTLE GUEST ROOM - LINDBLUM DRAGON'S GATE
text: TARGET TIME : 02:07:43 (+16:23) | TARGET GIL :  11,151 | ENCOUNTERS : 0
Pick up the Tent behind the platform, then head out into the Mist.
Cross the wetlands to Qu's Marsh, head to the pond and catch a frog for Quina (the huge one in the top right corner of the marsh is easy to catch).
BASE STATS: You can let Freya absorb any EXP you might come across once Quina has joined the party. (Hint: Type A x 2)                                  |
Equip your party as follows:
VIVI: Mage Staff, Steepled Hat, Leather Wrist, Cotton Robe, Yellow Scarf
ZIDANE: Butterfly Sword, Steepled Hat, Glass Armlet, Leather Shirt, Yellow Scarf
FREYA: Javelin, Iron Helm, Bronze Gloves, Linen Cuirass, Yellow Scarf
QUINA: Needle Fork, Feather Hat, Leather Wrist, Bronze Vest, Yellow Scarf, Add Status, Millionaire
Make sure only Zidane and Freya are in the front row.
Leave Qu's Marsh by way of the right path to avoid the frog-catching mini-game and head to Gizamaluke's Grotto.
Enter, pick up the first Gizamaluke Bell, then exit and save right outsidethe entrance.
[TARGET TIME: 02:12:37]
Now enter the main cavern to initiate your first and worst forced EXP encounter :)
BATTLE: TYPE A x 2
• The goal is to Petrify both Type A's with the Needle Fork.

• Ideally, you would Petrify them both with only 2 hits total, but the probability of this is only 1%. A more reasonable target would be to Petrify both within 4 or less hits - that's a 5% (1/20) chance.
• Have Quina attack non-stop and everyone else Defend, only using a Potion on themselves or Quina if they get low on HP.
• Keep in mind that the Type A's have 398 HP, so you may need to heal them as well, although chances are the battle will already have dragged on a bit too long if it comes to that.
|   Z   | Protect Girls 12/35 |                     |                     |
|   F   | Bird Killer    2/30 | Dragon Killer  2/70 | Cover          2/30 |
After the battle, backtrack out of the grotto once again and head east to Chocobo's Forest.
Save a few steps outside the grotto.
[TARGET TIME: 02:15:28]
Enter Chocobo's Forest, then exit, call Choco, and return to play a game ofChocobo Hot&Cold.
If you don't unearth the "Stone with Patterns" during your first game, reset and try again.
The "Stone with Patterns" will always be the "Streamside" Chocograph, so don't bother replaying in hopes of getting anything else. Once you have it, leave and save the game.
Now play another game of Hot&Cold. Reset until you find a Chocograph.
When you do, exit and ride to South Gate; grab the two items, then leave and save your game on another save file.
Check which Chocograph you got. You'll need both "Healing Shore" and "Small Beach", so reload the earlier save if you didn't get either.
Return and play 1 more game in hopes of getting the other Chocograph!
Be sure to purchase Gysahl Greens before leaving so that you have at least 6 in your inventory.
Equip Zidane with the Mage Masher and use Phoenix Down if needed.
Save your game near the forest by the river.
PATH C & COMBINED - See FAQ for details
[TARGET TIME: 02:22:55]
Head to the wild forest near the river and encounter a group of Mandragora.
Choose 1 Mandragora and have Vivi use Fire, Freya attack physically, and Quina use Eat to learn the almighty Limit Glove :)
Alternatively, have Zidane and Freya attack and Quina use Eat. This method also works if you get a pre-emptive strike!
Once you've done this, make either Vivi or Freya attack Quina to knock him/her out and then have Zidane use Flee to escape the battle without EXP.
Mount Choco and ride back to Gizamaluke's Grotto; place everyone in the back row and save your game outside.

BATTLE: TYPE A x 2

You need to have Quina knocked out before reaching the save point so use the Needle Fork only for the first Type A. Once one of them is Stopped or Petrified have Quina knocked out and use Stop for the win.
You should aim to finish this battle within 4 Stop/Petrify attempts.

If the battle doesn't go that well, don't reset. Finish and try to complete this segment without returning to the world map. If you make it to the end without encounters then the time you lost with a sub-par battle will be made up for by not having backtracked.

[TARGET TIME: 03:04:07]
Enter the Auction House to reunite with Garnet, then go back inside.
* You need to win the Magician Robe, Madain's Ring, and Reflect Ring.

* Although it's possible for all three to appear in a single auction, it's very rare, and then you still need to win them at a reasonable price, so I suggest you plan two auctions and save in between.

* You should also bid on Griffin's Heart, Doga's Artifact and Une's Mirror; you can turn a nice profit by selling them to the nobles in front of the synthesis shop for 10,000, 10,000 and 15,000 Gil, respectively! So make sure you win them at lower prices, obviously.

* The table below shows the price ranges for the items as listed in the Ultimania, as well as their resell values; you should aim to win the items at no more than the average price, and for the items you don't need or have already won, bid the average value to hopefully push the auction to its final stages faster.

* The Mini-Cid has a narrow price range, so bidding 2,000 to 2,400 Gil should finish the auction fast without you actually buying the item. You should avoid buying it because it's the easiest item to skip and you will have to do this many times when buying all the Promist Ring later on Disc 3.

* Keep in mind that only the total Gil spent matters, so you can spend a bit more on some items if you get others much cheaper. In total, you should aim to spend no more than around 65,000 Gil (including the key items which you should sell for a profit).
* Exiting and re-entering takes around 7 seconds, so it's OK if you do it once or twice per attempt if needed.
- Mini-Cid: PRICE RANGE 1,500 - 4,500 : AVERAGE 3,000: VALUE0
- Griffin's Heart : PRICE RANGE 3,000 - 9,000 : AVERAGE 6,000: VALUE 10,000
- Magician Robe : PRICE RANGE 3,500 - 10,500 : AVERAGE 7,000: VALUE 4,000
- Doga's Artifact : PRICE RANGE 4,000 - 12,000 : AVERAGE 8,000: VALUE 10,000
- Fairy Earrings: PRICE RANGE 4,000 - 12,000 : AVERAGE 8,000: VALUE 3,000
- Une's Mirror: PRICE RANGE 6,000 - 18,000 : AVERAGE 12,000: VALUE 15,000
- Madain's Ring : PRICE RANGE 3,500 - 10,500 : AVERAGE 7,000: VALUE 3,750
- Reflect Ring: PRICE RANGE 6,000 - 18,000 : AVERAGE 12,000: VALUE 3,500
- Pearl Rouge : PRICE RANGE 7,000 - 21,000 : AVERAGE 14,000: VALUE 2,000
* COMBINED: You will also need to win the Pearl Rouge; Freya will need it when absorbing unavoidable EXP in the future.
